utils_config.h
==============

**Overview**\ 
--------------

**Related Modules:**

`Utils_config <utils_config.md>`__

**Description:**

Represents the configuration file of the utils subsystem.

Vendors can set their desired items in the configuration file.

**Since:**

1.0

**Version:**

1.0

**Summary**\ 
-------------
